definition: European Community, old term for EU, European Union 歐盟|欧盟[Ou1 meng2]
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: Prime Minister Ted Heath takes Britain into the European Community
sentences.chinese: 1973年希思首相把英國帶入歐洲共同體。

sentences.english: Over-production is seriously unbalancing the EEC economy.
sentences.chinese: 因生產過剩，歐洲共同體經濟嚴重失衡。

sentences.english: Its membership includes 171 countries and the European Community.
sentences.chinese: 其成員組成包括171個國家以及歐洲共同體。
